Major_Arcs.title: The Clam Debt Trick
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Guz's elaborate scheme to recover a debt from King Guz by feigning drowning, highlighting Guz's manipulative nature.

sub_scenes.title: Staged Drowning and Debt Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Guz pretends to drown to leverage King Guz into repaying an old debt, showcasing his cunning and opportunistic behavior.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Shopping and Dinny's Fate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop and others as they encounter a clumsy dinosaur, visit a dinosaur dealership, witness a chaotic test ride, and see Dinny traded in and resold, exploring themes of consumerism and animal treatment.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto Soreness and Age
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop encounters a clumsy dinosaur, leading to a conversation about its old age and prompting the idea of a trade-in.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dealership and Shopping
sub_scenes.description: The scene shifts to Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership where customers are shown browsing and interacting with dinosaurs for sale.

narrative_arcs.title: Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership and Shopping

sub_scenes.title: The Zippy Dinosaur's Test Ride and Purchase
sub_scenes.description: A customer test rides a dinosaur, experiences an unexpected pinch, but buys it anyway, highlighting the impulsive nature of consumer decisions.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zippy Dinosaur's Test Ride and Pinch
Concluding the Dinosaur Deal After Test Ride

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Trade and Resale
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is traded in, causing emotional farewells, and is then quickly put up for sale at a discounted price at the dealership, showcasing the transactional and somewhat heartless nature of commerce.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinny on Sale at the Dinosaur Dealership

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Uncontrolled Return
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Dinny's unexpected and chaotic return to the dealership and his former owner, causing disruption and revealing his unpredictable nature.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Unmasking and Defense
sub_scenes.description: Dinny reappears disguised and is recognized during a test ride, leading to his defense against mistreatment and reunion with his former owner.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Unpleasant Test Ride

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Troubles and Fishing Trip Misogyny
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores relationship dynamics through Alley and Coola's breakup and transitions into a misogynistic fishing trip scenario, highlighting male-female interactions and conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Alley and Coola's Breakup
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Coola fishing, but she rejects him, leading to a breakup and a dramatic rock-falling exit orchestrated by Coola.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Trip Misogyny and Annoyances
sub_scenes.description: The scene shifts to a fishing trip where misogynistic views are expressed and various annoyances among the fishermen escalate to a confrontation and apology.

narrative_arcs.title: Fishing Trip Annoyances: Baiting and Loud Talking
Confrontation and Apology on the Fishing Trip

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misadventures and Advice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores various romantic entanglements, misunderstandings, and advice, including gossip, jealousy, misdirected aggression, and strategic but absurd romantic techniques.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gossip and Misdirection
sub_scenes.description: Gossip about Coola's faithfulness leads to skepticism and an investigation, which misdirects focus to Cherie instead.

narrative_arcs.title: Gossip and Competition for Coola's Affections
Skepticism and the Challenge to Verify Coola's Loyalty

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy sparks a violent confrontation based on a misunderstanding of romantic advances, revealing misdirected aggression and Koko's preference.

narrative_arcs.title: Misdirected Aggression and a Name Revealed
Affectionate Comfort and a Confused Realization

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Advice and Strategy
sub_scenes.description: Romantic advice is given, ranging from avoiding violence to employing absurd 'French Fried Freak' techniques, met with skeptical contemplation.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Offerings and Unexpected Events
sub_scenes.description: Romantic gestures are made, including flowers and a log, but these are interrupted by jealousy, a crocodile attack, and social critique of vulgarity.

narrative_arcs.title: Critique of Vulgarity and Subdued Crocodile

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Chaos and Misunderstandings
sub_scenes.description: Romantic chaos ensues with jealous rage, a passionate interlude, verbal insults, and a violent misunderstanding over a hand kiss.

Major_Arcs.title: Social Commentary on Relationships
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes social norms around relationships, showcasing public accusations of infidelity, violent retribution, and a male perspective on confusing female behavior.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity and its Consequences
sub_scenes.description: Public accusations and violent punishments for infidelity are depicted, highlighting the social repercussions of perceived relationship transgressions.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Romantic Transformation
sub_scenes.description: Alley undergoes a romantic transformation, attempting to adopt a romantic persona while male observers express confusion about female behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley's Romantic Resolution and New Approach

Major_Arcs.title: Social Fads and their Absurdity: The Twitch Dance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes social trends and fads through the exaggerated consequences of the 'New Twist' dance, showing injuries and social pressure to conform.

sub_scenes.title: The Perils of the Twitch Dance
sub_scenes.description: The dangers of the 'New Twist' dance are revealed through injuries and cautionary tales, while social pressure to participate is introduced.

narrative_arcs.title: Consequences of the New Twist Dance
Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Dance

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Identity Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Alley attempts to learn the 'twitch' dance, leading to a chaotic lesson, mishaps, and a surprising reveal of Alley's true identity.

sub_scenes.title: The Widespread Twitch Epidemic
sub_scenes.description: The consequences of the 'twitch' dance become widespread, leading to public humiliation and mass hospitalization, revealing its absurd and dangerous nature.

narrative_arcs.title: Nighttime Twitch Discussion and Mysterious Fear

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to Spain
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc initiates a time travel plotline, sending Alley to 16th century Spain for research purposes, leading to comedic misunderstandings and adventures.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Planning and Juxtaposition
sub_scenes.description: The idea of time travel is introduced as a solution for research, juxtaposed with a romantic scene with Alley and Ooola before his departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Researching 16th Century Spain and the Time Machine Idea
Preparing the Time Machine for Oop
Romantic Moonlight Scene with Alley and Ooola

sub_scenes.title: The Interrupted Kiss and Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Ooola's anticipated first kiss is comically interrupted by their sudden transportation to the 20th century via time machine.

narrative_arcs.title: Arguing and Agreeing to a Kiss
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in the 20th Century and the Spanish Mission
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Ooola arrive in the 20th century and are immediately tasked with a mission in Spain, despite Alley's romantic frustrations.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spanish Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Time Travel
Postponed Kiss and Dispatch to Ancient Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Adventures in Spain
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Alley's comedic and chaotic adventures in 16th century Spain, filled with misunderstandings, confrontations, and unexpected bullfighting.

sub_scenes.title: Spanish Serenade and Alley's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Alley arrives in Spain and quickly gets involved in a serenade gone wrong, leading to miscommunication and a violent intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Confusion
The Serenade and the Annoyed Observer

sub_scenes.title: Consequences of Intervention and Escalation
sub_scenes.description: Alley's intervention escalates the situation, leading to accusations, identity assertions, and the arrival of Don Jose's Manager, hinting at further trouble.

narrative_arcs.title: Attack on the Serenader and Balcony Woman's Initial Reaction
Apology, Impending Consequences, and the Manager's Arrival

sub_scenes.title: The Bullfight
sub_scenes.description: The narrative shifts to the chaotic preparation and commencement of a bullfight, featuring discussions of technique, recruitment, and moral objections.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgency to Start the Bullfight and Crowd's Demand

sub_scenes.title: The Bullfight Performance and Spectator View
sub_scenes.description: The bullfight unfolds with spectator commentary, doubts about the bullfighter's courage, and a surprisingly swift and triumphant outcome using a stone-age axe.

narrative_arcs.title: Spectator Commentary on Bullfighter's Appearance and Weapon Choice
Doubt and Reassurance about the Bullfighter's Courage

Major_Arcs.title: Oop's Mission Debrief and Unexpected Revelation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Oop's return from his Spanish mission, initially anticipating a promised kiss, but leading to a surprising denial and revelation about his experience.

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Return and Changed Perspective
sub_scenes.description: Oop returns from Spain, initially expecting a reward, but his experience has profoundly changed him, leading to an unexpected denial of the promised kiss and a mysterious revelation.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop for Information
Courting Scene with Spanish Lady and Gentleman
Oop's Abduction and Jane's Relief at His Return
Jane Reminds Oop of Promised Kiss
Oop's Unexpected Denial of Kiss and Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: Political Satire - King for a Day
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes political power and leadership through the 'King for a Day' concept, showcasing the burdens of rule, temporary replacements, and fickle public opinion.

sub_scenes.title: The King for a Day Fiasco
sub_scenes.description: The 'King for a Day' concept is introduced, explored through initial experiences, a temporary replacement, public rejection, and the original king's manipulative return.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day and the Reality of Throne Life
King's Planned Absence and Temporary Replacement
King for a Day and the Reality of Throne Life
King's Planned Absence and Temporary Replacement
Proclamation and Respect Demand for Temporary King
Reign of Rocks: The Temporary King's Downfall
Aftermath and the Original King's Return

Major_Arcs.title: Domestic Comedy - Guz and Oompa
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc provides a comedic glimpse into the domestic life of Guz and Oompa, highlighting their conflict and Guz's eventual understanding.

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Domestic Misadventure
sub_scenes.description: Guz's relaxed leisure is disrupted by Oompa's anger over his messy habits and consumption of ulcer pills, leading to a chase and Guz's subsequent realization.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Misunderstood Leisure and Oompa's Ire
Guz's Tub Contemplation and Vacation Insight

Major_Arcs.title: Community Conflicts and Resolutions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a series of brief conflicts within the community, including cheating accusations, money fights, and a clam dispute, resolved by a wise elder.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Dispute and Wise Judgment
sub_scenes.description: Various disputes erupt within the community, culminating in a clam dispute resolved by the wise elder's intervention and a somewhat anticlimactic outcome.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Cheating in a Game
The Mystery of the Missing Clams and Royal Inquiry
Royal Deduction and Wise Elder Intervention in the Clam Dispute
Wise Elder's Resolution: 'Nothing Left to Fight About'

Major_Arcs.title: Palace Life and Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc offers a glimpse into palace life, showcasing disturbances, financial impropriety, and a volatile relationship between the crowned caveman and his advisor/guard.

sub_scenes.title: Moonina Palace Intrigue
sub_scenes.description: Disturbances in Moonina Palace lead to investigations, accusations of financial misconduct by the guard, and a dinner scene that turns confrontational over the king's health.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Disruption and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: A seemingly pleasant dinner scene takes a dark turn as playful interaction escalates into a surprise violent attack on the crowned caveman.

Major_Arcs.title: Loose Ends and New Opportunities
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features resolutions and new beginnings, including apologies between Guz and Oompah, the former king's relief at abdication, and a young caveman being offered rulership.

sub_scenes.title: Resolutions and New Beginnings
sub_scenes.description: Apologies are exchanged, the former king rejoices in his newfound freedom, and a young caveman is unexpectedly offered rulership, suggesting shifts in power and personal dynamics.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring with a Board and Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: Social Practices and Absurd Professions: The Barberous Act
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a peculiar social practice, the 'Barberous Act', and its commercialization in 'Moo Tonsorial Parlor', exploring themes of social norms and unusual services.

sub_scenes.title: The Barberous Act Revealed
sub_scenes.description: The 'Barberous Act' is revealed to be a forced and unpleasant shaving service, yet it's a functioning business with impatient customers, highlighting societal acceptance of the absurd.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Gone Wrong
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with a time travel experiment gone awry, resulting in the unexpected arrival of a Roman Centurion instead of Oop, and the inventor's realization of a malfunction.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Mishap
sub_scenes.description: A time travel experiment intended to bring Oop to the present malfunctions, resulting in the arrival of a Roman Centurion and the inventor's realization of the error.
